duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a positive fitness experience tailored to member's specific goals through personalized fitness programs.
Create value in fitness programs and member experience through one-on-one training, small group training, and member engagement activities.
Drive retention through motivation, accountability, consistency, and knowledge-based fitness programs.
Serve as a NYSC club ambassador by providing service and solutions to meet member's needs.
Review and adhere to all NYSC and brand documents, including policies, procedures, and codes of conduct.
Maintain client programs, fitness assessment forms, and necessary certifications.
Proficiency in the use of POS and membership system, timekeeping, and other computer programs.
Partner with Fitness Leaders, Operations/Sales team, and engage in prospecting activities.
Deliver safe and effective fitness programs followed with mid-program fitness assessments.
Meet and maintain monthly and quarterly production minimums for specified job role.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Exercise Physiology, Kinesiology, Recreation, or P.E. (helpful but not required)
